players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is Mafia. We must vote her out today."
Bob: "I'm a villager and I'm shocked by Charlie's death. Diana claims she investigated Alice and found her to be Mafia. I need to hear from Alice and anyone else before I make a decision."
You: "Diana is lying. I investigated Bob last night and he is the Mafia. We should vote him out."
You: "Diana is clearly lying to protect Bob. I investigated Bob and he is Mafia. Trust me, vote Bob out."
Diana: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and I investigated her. She is Mafia. She is trying to create confusion to save herself. Vote Alice."

Bob: "I'm a villager and this is very confusing. Diana says Alice is Mafia, and Alice says I'm Mafia. I don't have any special abilities so I can't verify anything. I need to try and figure out who is telling the truth..."
